OrgName.entry: DORE VILLAGE SOCIETY - ENVIRONMENT AND CONSERVATION

Desc.entry: Fosters the protection and enhancement of the local environment and amenities within Dore and encourages a spirit of community and records its historic development. Hosts Dore Show on the second Saturday in September. Publishes quarterly magazine, Dore to Door.

Pubs.entry: Dore to Door; Occasional historical booklets; Christmas cards and notelets

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Last Tues in the month at 7.30pm (committee meeting), 1st Sat in the month 10am-12noon (public meeting)
